name: Sbeu Simulator
description:
Sbeu Simulator is a revolutionary online FPS made with Unity, Photon Unity Networking and Playfab as a persistent data storage. 

The game features: 

  • An online game mode with real opponents; 
  • An AI system with 4 states making the game intense even without real players;
  • СБЭY; 
  • Persistent data storage using Playfab; 
  • A ranking system; 
  • Simple and intuitive UI; 
  • Outstanding graphics with high-resolution textures from https://ambientcg.com/ and high-quality post-processing; 
  • Smooth gameplay with high performance; 
  • A diverse arsenal with 1 weapons in total; 
  • High-quality models and animations; 
  • Amazing sound design and soundtrack by geneburn and Bleed the Sky;
